h2_title: How to Understand the Early Game Skills Trees
content: On the left-hand side of the Staff Stances tab, you’ll also find uncategorized skills. The ones closest to the Smash Stance set will increase your health recovery, the damage you deal, and the stamina you recover.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Skills_to_Unlock.md', within the main section titled 'Best Skills to Unlock', specifically from the subsection 'How to Understand the Early Game Skills Trees'.
The content is as follows:
On the left-hand side of the Staff Stances tab, you’ll also find uncategorized skills. The ones closest to the Smash Stance set will increase your health recovery, the damage you deal, and the stamina you recover.
